text: A flute that no one else played was long lying in the field until one day a donkey walking around blew up loudly and made it produce the sweetest sound of his life, that is, the life of the Donkey and the Flute. Unable to understand what had happened, as rationality was not their strong point and they both believed in rationality, they separated in a rush, ashamed of the best they had done during their sad existence. FIN
title: El burro y la flauta
author: Augusto Monterroso
